#summary These elements represent section headers.
#labels about-html,is-html-element,from-w3c

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > *h6 element*

== Usage ==

[SpecificationHTML4 HTML 4] says, "A heading element briefly describes the topic of the section it introduces. Heading information may be used by user agents, for example, to construct a table of contents for a document automatically."

TipNestingHeaders
